edu.nyu.cs.javagit.client
Interface IGitCheckout

All Known Implementing Classes:
CliGitCheckout
public interface IGitCheckout

An interface to represent the <git-checkout> command.

Method Summary
 GitCheckoutResponse checkout(java.io.File repositoryPath)
          Vanilla version of <git-checkout> where no options and no branch info is passed to it and files are checked out from current branch.
 GitCheckoutResponse checkout(java.io.File repositoryPath, GitCheckoutOptions options, Ref branch)
          Checks out either an existing branch or new branch from the repository.
 GitCheckoutResponse checkout(java.io.File repositoryPath, GitCheckoutOptions options, Ref branch, java.io.File file)
          Checks out either an existing branch or new branch from the repository.
 GitCheckoutResponse checkout(java.io.File repositoryPath, GitCheckoutOptions options, Ref branch, java.util.List<java.io.File> paths)
          Checks out either an existing branch or new branch from the repository.
 GitCheckoutResponse checkout(java.io.File repositoryPath, java.util.List<java.io.File> paths)
          <git-checkout> where a list of files is given to be checked out from current branch of the repository.
 GitCheckoutResponse checkout(java.io.File repositoryPath, Ref branch)
          Checks out an existing branch with no options provided.
 GitCheckoutResponse checkout(java.io.File repositoryPath, Ref treeIsh, java.util.List<java.io.File> paths)
          <git-checkout> where a list of files is given to be checked out with tree-ish option set.
 

Method Detail

checkout

GitCheckoutResponse checkout(java.io.File repositoryPath,
                             GitCheckoutOptions options,
                             Ref branch,
                             java.util.List<java.io.File> paths)
                             throws JavaGitException,
                                    java.io.IOException
Checks out either an existing branch or new branch from the repository.

Parameters:
repositoryPath - Path to the root of the repository
options - GitCheckoutOptions object used for passing options to <git-checkout>
branch - Name of the base branch that need to be checked out or if the new branch is being checkout based on this base branch.
paths - List of files that are specifically to be checked out.
Returns:
GitCheckoutResponse object
Throws:
JavaGitException - thrown if -
  • if options passed are not correct.
  • if the output for <git-checkout> command generated an error.
  • if processBuilder not able to run the command.
java.io.IOException - thrown if -
  • paths given do not have proper permissions.
  • paths given do not exist at all.

checkout

GitCheckoutResponse checkout(java.io.File repositoryPath,
                             GitCheckoutOptions options,
                             Ref branch,
                             java.io.File file)
                             throws JavaGitException,
                                    java.io.IOException
Checks out either an existing branch or new branch from the repository.

Parameters:
repositoryPath - Path to the root of the repository
options - GitCheckoutOptions object used for passing options to <git-checkout>
branch - Name of the base branch that need to be checked out or if the new branch is being checkout based on this base branch.
file - Single file that need to be checked out from the git repository
Returns:
GitCheckoutResponse object
Throws:
JavaGitException - thrown if -
  • if options passed are not correct.
  • if the output for <git-checkout> command generated an error.
  • if processBuilder not able to run the command.
java.io.IOException - thrown if -
  • paths given do not have proper permissions.
  • paths given do not exist at all.

<git-checkout> where a list of files is given to be checked out from current branch of the repository.

                             java.util.List<java.io.File> paths)

<git-checkout> where a list of files is given to be checked out with tree-ish option set.

Parameters:
repositoryPath - path to the root of the repository

paths - List of files to be checked out.

GitCheckoutResponse object
Throws:

  • if processBuilder not able to run the command.
